Script.label: right_rotary_inc
Script.script: (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 1 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_PLUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 2 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_PLUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 3 == if{ 1 (>K:HEADING_BUG_INC) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 5 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_PLUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 4 == if{ 1 (L:WT_CJ4_LNAV_MODE, Number) } 2 == if{ (>K:VOR2_OBI_INC) } els{ (>K:VOR1_OBI_INC) }

Script.label: right_rotary_dec
Script.script: (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 1 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_MINUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 2 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_MINUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 3 == if{ 1 (>K:HEADING_BUG_DEC) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 5 == if{ 1 (>K:KEY_MINUS, KeyEvent) } (L:wt_knob_selector, Number) 4 == if{ 1 (L:WT_CJ4_LNAV_MODE, Number) } 2 == if{ (A:NAV OBS:2, degree) 1 - dnor (>K:VOR2_SET) } els{ (A:NAV OBS:1, degree) 1 - dnor (>K:VOR1_SET) }
